net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target
Class XmlSummaryFileTarget

java.lang.Object
  net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target.XmlSummaryFileTarget
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExecutionTarget
public class XmlSummaryFileTarget
extends Object
implements ExecutionTarget

An ExecutionTarget that writes digests to an XML file.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud

Initialize the target.

Should be called before first call to ExecutionTarget.write(String, java.io.File, String).

write

public void write(String digest,
                  File file,
                  String algorithm)
Write the hashcode calculated for the given file and algorithm to the target.

Specified by:
write in interface ExecutionTarget
Parameters:
digest - the digest to write.
file - the file for which the digest was calculated.
algorithm - the algorithm used to calculate the digest.

close

public void close()
           throws ExecutionTargetCloseException
Close the target.

Should be called after last call to ExecutionTarget.write(String, java.io.File, String).

Specified by:
close in interface ExecutionTarget
Throws:
ExecutionTargetCloseException - if an error occured while closing the target.
